duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement partner programs strategy globally to recruit, onboard, and enable partners to drive incremental revenue.
Manage partner incentives to drive incremental revenue for partners and the organization.
Create partner programs communications and content strategy in conjunction with marketing and enablement teams.
Communicate partner programs strategy, value proposition, and operations externally and internally.
Manage and evolve partner agreements and contracting processes, working in close coordination with legal and Sales Operations teams.
Work closely with systems and marketing operations teams to ensure the Partner Portal provides partners an easy to use and engaging platform.
Own partner program metrics and reporting to key internal stakeholders, collaborating with GTM Strategy and Operations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business or related field (Master's preferred)
